sqlReaderQuery.value: select CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), max(idr_load_date), 112)  as max_idr_load_date from base_orders

parameters.Subject: IDR Orders Ingestion Error
parameters.Activity: QC Check - Copy IDR To Storage
parameters.ErrorMessage: Record counts between IDR and storage file didn't match, please check the ADF pipeline

source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as staging_record_count from stg_orders

parameters.Subject: IDR Orders Ingestion Error
parameters.Activity: QC Check - Storage to SQLDW Staging
parameters.ErrorMessage:
Record counts between incremental data file and SQLDW 
staging did not match, please check the ADF pipeline

parameters.Subject: IDR Orders Ingestion Error
parameters.Activity: QC Check - Load Staging to Target
parameters.ErrorMessage:
Record counts between SQLDW staging and Target
doesn't match, please check the ADF pipeline

parameters.Subject: ADF pipeline Load IDR Litter Shipments finished successfully

sqlReaderQuery.value: select CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), max(idr_load_date), 112)  as max_idr_load_date from base_shipments

properties.description: Reusable pipeline to send email notification on activity failure

activities.name: Send email on failure
activities.description: Reusable pipeline to send email on activity failure

body.value:
{"EmailTo":"@{pipeline().parameters.EmailTo}",
"Subject":"An error has occured in the ADF pipeline",
"DataFactoryName":"@{pipeline().parameters.DataFactoryName}",
"PipelineName":"@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
"Activity":"@{pipeline().parameters.Activity}",
"ErrorMessage":"@{pipeline().parameters.ErrorMessage}" }

oracleReaderQuery.value:
select *
from clxbw.apo_bw_b_billing ship join clxbw.apo_bw_d_material mat on ship.material_num=mat.material_num
where to_char(load_date,'yyyymmdd') > 20201114
